column5: Pre-conditions
column6: Test Steps
column7: Expected Results

column4: Validate DNA Center web UI and API accessibility
column5: DNA Center HA deployed; Network connectivity established
column6: 1. Access DNA Center via browser using VIP; 2. Verify SSL certificate valid; 3. Login with AD credentials; 4. Test API endpoint /dna/system/api/v1/auth/token
column7: DNA Center accessible via HTTPS; API returns valid token; AD authentication successful

column5: HA pair configured; Both appliances operational
column6: 1. Verify HA status shows Active/Standby; 2. Simulate primary failure; 3. Verify failover to secondary; 4. Confirm VIP remains accessible
column7: Failover completes within 60 seconds; No service interruption; VIP accessible throughout

column4: Validate network device discovery and onboarding
column5: DNA Center operational; Device credentials configured
column6: 1. Add device credentials to DNA Center; 2. Initiate device discovery; 3. Verify device appears in inventory; 4. Check device health status
column7: Device discovered and added to inventory; Health metrics visible; IOS version detected

column4: Validate zero-touch provisioning for new devices
column5: PnP server configured; Template assigned; New device connected
column6: 1. Connect unconfigured device to network; 2. Verify PnP claim in DNA Center; 3. Confirm template applied; 4. Validate device configuration
column7: Device auto-discovered; Template applied within 15 minutes; Configuration validated

column5: 200 devices onboarded; 14-day learning period complete
column6: 1. Access AI Analytics dashboard; 2. Verify baselines established for devices; 3. Check anomaly detection status; 4. Review network health score
column7: Baselines established for all device types; Health score calculated; No false alerts

column5: AI Analytics operational; Historical data available
column6: 1. Review predictive insights dashboard; 2. Verify prediction algorithms active; 3. Check prediction accuracy metrics; 4. Validate 14-day horizon
column7: Predictions generated; Accuracy >85%; 14-day prediction window active

column5: AI baselines established; Network traffic flowing
column6: 1. Inject test anomaly (unusual traffic pattern); 2. Verify anomaly detected; 3. Check alert generated; 4. Review root cause analysis
column7: Anomaly detected within 5 minutes; Alert created; Root cause identified

column5: AD servers configured; User groups created
column6: 1. Login as admin group member; 2. Verify full access; 3. Login as viewer group member; 4. Verify read-only access
column7: RBAC correctly enforced; Admin has full access; Viewer has read-only

column4: Validate automated incident creation in ServiceNow
column5: ServiceNow integration configured; Critical alert triggered
column6: 1. Generate critical network event; 2. Verify ticket created in ServiceNow; 3. Check priority mapping; 4. Validate ticket details
column7: Incident created automatically; Priority correctly mapped; All required fields populated

column5: ServiceNow ticket created; DNA Center integration active
column6: 1. Update ticket status in ServiceNow; 2. Verify status reflected in DNA Center; 3. Close ticket; 4. Confirm sync complete
column7: Status changes synchronized within 5 minutes; Bi-directional updates working

column4: Validate device inventory synchronization with NetBox
column5: NetBox integration configured; Devices in DNA Center
column6: 1. Verify initial sync completed; 2. Add new device to DNA Center; 3. Check NetBox for new device; 4. Validate device attributes
column7: Inventory synced within 15 minutes; New devices appear in NetBox; Attributes accurate

column5: Policy templates created; Target devices identified
column6: 1. Select policy template; 2. Deploy to device group; 3. Verify staged deployment; 4. Validate configuration on devices
column7: Policy deployed successfully; Configuration validated; Compliance check passed

column5: Compliance policy defined; Baseline established
column6: 1. Introduce configuration drift on test device; 2. Wait for compliance check; 3. Verify drift detected; 4. Check remediation option
column7: Drift detected within compliance interval; Alert generated; Remediation available

column5: Application monitoring enabled; Traffic flowing to apps
column6: 1. Access application experience dashboard; 2. Verify O365 metrics; 3. Check Webex call quality; 4. Validate SAP response times
column7: All three applications monitored; Metrics within SLA thresholds; Alerts configured

column5: DNA Center operational; 200 devices onboarded
column6: 1. Access main dashboard; 2. Measure load time; 3. Navigate to device inventory; 4. Measure page transitions
column7: Dashboard loads within 3 seconds; Page transitions under 2 seconds

column5: All devices onboarded; Telemetry streaming enabled
column6: 1. Verify telemetry streams active; 2. Check processing latency; 3. Validate data freshness; 4. Monitor during peak hours
column7: Telemetry processed within 5 minutes; No data loss; Metrics current

column5: Policy template ready; 200 target devices
column6: 1. Select all 200 devices; 2. Deploy policy; 3. Measure deployment time; 4. Verify all devices configured
column7: Policy deployed to 200 devices in under 5 minutes

column5: API endpoints operational; Load testing tools ready
column6: 1. Generate 100 concurrent API requests; 2. Measure response times; 3. Check error rates; 4. Validate throttling behavior
column7: API handles 100 concurrent requests; P95 latency under 2 seconds; No errors

column5: DNA Center operational; Monitoring configured
column6: 1. Monitor uptime over 7-day test period; 2. Track any outages; 3. Calculate availability; 4. Review incident reports
column7: Availability exceeds 99.9% (less than 10 minutes downtime per week)

column5: Backup configured; Recovery procedure documented
column6: 1. Trigger manual backup; 2. Verify backup completion; 3. Simulate failure scenario; 4. Execute restore procedure
column7: Backup completes successfully; Recovery achieves RTO <4 hours and RPO <24 hours

column5: AD groups configured; Test users created
column6: 1. Test admin role permissions; 2. Test viewer role restrictions; 3. Attempt unauthorized actions; 4. Verify audit logging
column7: Permissions correctly enforced; Unauthorized actions blocked; All access logged

column4: Validate TLS encryption for all traffic
column5: SSL certificates installed; Network traffic visible
column6: 1. Capture management traffic; 2. Verify TLS 1.2+ usage; 3. Check certificate validity; 4. Test with invalid certificate
column7: All traffic encrypted; TLS 1.2 minimum; Invalid certificates rejected

column4: Validate secure storage of device credentials
column5: Credentials configured; Encryption enabled
column6: 1. Review credential storage; 2. Verify encryption at rest; 3. Test credential access; 4. Check audit trail
column7: Credentials encrypted; Access restricted to authorized users; Audit complete

column5: Audit logging enabled; Syslog configured
column6: 1. Perform administrative actions; 2. Check local audit logs; 3. Verify syslog forwarding; 4. Test log retention
column7: All actions logged; Logs forwarded to syslog; 365-day retention verified

column5: AI baselines established; Test anomalies prepared
column6: 1. Inject known anomaly patterns; 2. Track detection rate; 3. Inject normal variations; 4. Track false positive rate
column7: True positive rate >90%; False positive rate <5%

column5: Historical failure data available; AI models trained
column6: 1. Review predictions over test period; 2. Compare to actual failures; 3. Calculate prediction accuracy; 4. Assess prediction lead time
column7: Prediction accuracy >85%; Lead time averaging 14 days

column5: Anomaly detected; Root cause analysis available
column6: 1. Trigger test network issue; 2. Review AI root cause suggestion; 3. Compare to actual cause; 4. Measure time to root cause
column7: Root cause correctly identified >80% of cases; Time to root cause <5 minutes

column5: 190 devices onboarded; 10 additional available
column6: 1. Onboard remaining 10 devices; 2. Verify system performance; 3. Check resource utilization; 4. Validate no degradation
column7: 200 devices fully supported; No performance degradation; Headroom for growth
